query.name: list
query.comment: Get the list of projects that the current user can update
query.sql: SELECT project.id, project.name, project.status, project.create_date FROM jason_project AS project INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = project.id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id ORDER BY project.create_date DESC LIMIT :first, :last
query.sql-count: SELECT count(project.id) FROM jason_project AS project INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = project.id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id
